metadata.title: Friday, 15th March, 2013
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Health why there is low staffing of medical personnel in most rural health centres.

Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education what disciplinary action the Ministry has taken against teachers who were transferred to other stations in 2011 but refused to move.
Minister of Chiefs and Traditional Affairs when the Government will construct palaces for Chieftainess Kanyembo and Chief Nshimba of Nchelenge District.
parts: (a)when the Government will construct markets in the following wards in Nchelenge Parliamentary Constituency:
(b)when construction of the new market at Velos in Kashikishi Ward will be completed.
